text: Kern Community College District is a community college district in Kern County, California. Colleges a part of the district are: Bakersfield College, Porterville College, and Cerro Coso Community College.Home Page. Kern Community College District. Accessed: 04-04-2011. ==References== ==External links== *Kern Community College District Category:California Community Colleges Category:Universities and colleges in Kern County, California
title: Kern Community College District
